approveMangrove(address,uint256).notice: trader needs to approve Mangrove to let it perform outbound token transfer at the end of the `makerExecute` function

redeemToken(address,uint256).notice: transfers token stored in `this` contract to some recipient address

set_shift(int256).notice: price at position i will be shifted (up or down depending on the sign of `shift`) of (shift*delta) / BASE_0

withdrawFromMangrove(address,uint256).notice: withdraws ETH from the bounty vault of the Mangrove.
